Name: David Sweetman
Title: Mobile Developer
About:
The mobile platform has opened up a whole new field of computing and we’ve only scratched the surface of what’s possible. I love to explore and to learn things. I find graphics programming fascinating, I count it a good day if I get to write some bash, and I have an interest in assistive technologies.

I’m proud of my iPhone/iPad app, StorySkeleton. The app has been pretty well received in the fiction writing niche. Also, an app I developed at Mirada Studios called Mirror World won a Silver Lion at Cannes 2013.

I enjoy vim and the delta blues.
